bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('user')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/dynamic/user/subscription?page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('最近阅读', `{{Get('url')}}/dynamic/user/history?page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '月点击',
    '周点击',
    '日点击',
    '更新日'
];
orderby = [
    '?orderBy=monthlyCount',
    '?orderBy=weeklyCount',
    '?orderBy=dailyCount',
    '?orderBy=update'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/show${orderby[i]}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
type = [
    '全部','玄幻','热血','恋爱','都市','冒险','古风','穿越',
    '爆笑','校园','少年','修真','搞笑','生活','动作','霸总',
    '后宫','武侠','科幻','悬疑','恐怖','魔幻','少女','奇幻',
    '唯美','励志','总裁','复仇','美食','格斗','竞技','古装',
    '纯爱','推理','惊险','虐心','漫改','萌系','彩虹','日漫',
    '游戏','机甲','明星','灵异','仙侠','历史','战争','治愈',
    '日常','僵尸','宫斗','偶像','浪漫','震撼','权谋','战斗',
    '青春','神魔','脑洞','社会','萝莉','真人','美少女','运动',
    '恶搞','体育','暗黑','侦探','百合','惊奇','少男','逆袭',
    '系统','修仙','剧情','大女主','韩漫','欧风','怪物','其它'
];
categoryId = [
    '','&mainCategoryId=10024','&mainCategoryId=10023','&mainCategoryId=10126','&mainCategoryId=10124','&mainCategoryId=10210','&mainCategoryId=10143','&mainCategoryId=10129',
    '&mainCategoryId=10201','&mainCategoryId=10131','&mainCategoryId=10321','&mainCategoryId=10133','&mainCategoryId=10122','&mainCategoryId=10142','&mainCategoryId=10125','&mainCategoryId=10127',
    '&mainCategoryId=10138','&mainCategoryId=10139','&mainCategoryId=10181','&mainCategoryId=10183','&mainCategoryId=10185','&mainCategoryId=10227','&mainCategoryId=10301','&mainCategoryId=10242',
    '&mainCategoryId=10221','&mainCategoryId=10207','&mainCategoryId=10306','&mainCategoryId=10206','&mainCategoryId=10208','&mainCategoryId=10202','&mainCategoryId=10223','&mainCategoryId=10302',
    '&mainCategoryId=10209','&mainCategoryId=10211','&mainCategoryId=10222','&mainCategoryId=10205','&mainCategoryId=10165','&mainCategoryId=10204','&mainCategoryId=10235','&mainCategoryId=10281',
    '&mainCategoryId=10162','&mainCategoryId=10232','&mainCategoryId=10203','&mainCategoryId=10231','&mainCategoryId=10303','&mainCategoryId=10163','&mainCategoryId=10184','&mainCategoryId=10234',
    '&mainCategoryId=10308','&mainCategoryId=10243','&mainCategoryId=10229','&mainCategoryId=10305','&mainCategoryId=10224','&mainCategoryId=10381','&mainCategoryId=10228','&mainCategoryId=10309',
    '&mainCategoryId=10230','&mainCategoryId=10304','&mainCategoryId=10226','&mainCategoryId=10239','&mainCategoryId=10166','&mainCategoryId=10361','&mainCategoryId=10307','&mainCategoryId=10233',
    '&mainCategoryId=10236','&mainCategoryId=10341','&mainCategoryId=10383','&mainCategoryId=10382','&mainCategoryId=10384','&mainCategoryId=10322','&mainCategoryId=10641','&mainCategoryId=10943',
    '&mainCategoryId=10722','&mainCategoryId=10453','&mainCategoryId=10480','&mainCategoryId=10706','&mainCategoryId=10494','&mainCategoryId=11423','&mainCategoryId=11022','&mainCategoryId=10261'
];
for (j in type) {
    OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
    Status = `{{get('status',Get('q'))}}`;
    CharCategoryId = `{{get('charCategoryId',Get('p'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/show${OrderBy}${Status}${CharCategoryId}${categoryId[j]}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "Dnt": "1",
    "Pragma": "no-cache",
    "Sec-Ch-Ua": '"Google Chrome";v="123", "Not:A-Brand";v="8", "Chromium";v="123"',
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Mobile": "?1",
    "Sec-Ch-Ua-Platform": '"Android"',
    "Upgrade-Insecure-Requests": "1",
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "Accept": "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7",
    "X-Requested-With": "cn.nr19.mbrowser",
    "Sec-Fetch-Site": "same-origin",
    "Sec-Fetch-Mode": "navigate",
    "Sec-Fetch-User": "?1",
    "Sec-Fetch-Dest": "document",
    "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, zstd",
    "Accept-Language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7",
    "Origin": Get('url'),
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : Map('账号：'); if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('_ga=') && !String(Account).length > 0) { java.webView('', Get('url') + '/user/login', ''); } if(String(Account).length > 0 && cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('user')) { let pageId = result.replace(/.*dataPageId:\s(\d+)\,.*/, '$1'); let option = '{"body":"pageId=' + pageId + '","headers":{"Content-Type":"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"},"method": "POST"}'; let url = Get('url') + '/counting,' + option; java.ajax(url); } let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl); let bkm = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, '__cf__bkm'); let na = ck.includes('user') ? 'Y' : 'N'; let top = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'top_banner_counter_1500') > 0 ? parseInt(cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'top_banner_counter_1500')) : 0; top += 1; let cpcv = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'cpcv_top_counter_15') > 0 ? parseInt(cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'cpcv_top_counter_15')) : 0; cpcv += 1; let cpm = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'cpm_popunder_counter_60') > 0 ? parseInt(cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'cpm_popunder_counter_60')) : 0; cpm += 1; let sb = '8c0a375d8544f78968ab9f8f99cb9fd7'; let count = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, `sb_count_${sb}`) > 0 ? parseInt(cookie.getKey(baseUrl, `sb_count_${sb}`)) : 0; count += 1; let page = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, `sb_page_${sb}`) > 0 ? parseInt(cookie.getKey(baseUrl, `sb_page_${sb}`)) : 0; page += 1; cookie.setCookie(baseUrl, `${ck};_va=13;__na=${na};top_banner_counter_1500=${top};cpcv_top_counter_15=${cpcv};cpm_popunder_counter_60=${cpm};sb_main_${sb}=1;sb_onpage_${sb}=1;sb_count_${sb}=${count};sb_page_${sb}=${page}`); ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl); let domain = String(Get('url')).split(".")[1]; function addOptions(url, baseUrl, options) { let j = { "Referer": baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/, "") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { j.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, j); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function arrayToImg(arr, func, baseUrl, options) { let result = []; var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace('"Referer":"' + Get('url'), '"Referer":"' + baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap()["账号："] : '');
    if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('_ga=') && !String(Account).length > 0) {
        java.webView('', Get('url') + '/user/login', '');
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('user') && String(Account).length > 0) {
            eval(String(source.loginUrl));
            Login();
        }
    }
    let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
    let na = ck.includes('user') ? 'Y' : 'N';
    let top = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'top_banner_counter_1500') > 0 ? parseInt(cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'top_banner_counter_1500')) : 0;
    top += 1;
    cookie.setCookie(baseUrl, `${ck};_va=13;__na=${na};top_banner_counter_1500=${top}`);
    if (baseUrl.includes('/user/subscription')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.fed-padding-x.fed-part-rows.fed-line-top');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].select('span')[1].text();
            latest = list[i].select('span')[2].text() + '〔' + list[i].select('span')[3].text() + '〕';
            cache.put('Value' +Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href'), list[i].select('.fed-form-comp').attr('value'));
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cache.get('Cover' +Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')) ? cache.get('Cover' +Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')) : '',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
            });
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/user/history')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.fed-padding-x.fed-part-rows.fed-line-top');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].select('span')[1].text();
            latest = list[i].select('span')[4].text();
            intro = '\nㅤ\n⏰时间：' + list[i].select('span')[2].text() + '\n📖观看至：' + list[i].select('span')[3].text();
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': cache.get('Cover' +Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')) ? cache.get('Cover' +Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')) : '',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')
            });
        }
    } else {
        var list = java.getElements('.fed-list-item||.fed-deta-info');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].select('.fed-list-title').text();
            latest = list[i].select('.fed-list-remarks').text() + '〔' + list[i].select('.fed-list-desc').text() + '〕';
            cover = list[i].select('.fed-list-pics').attr('data-original') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option);
            cache.put('Cover' + Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href'), cover);
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.fed-list-title').attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[1] || !next_1.select('.fed-padding-x.fed-part-rows.fed-line-top')[1]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.fed-list-item, .fed-deta-info')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace('"Referer":"' + Get('url'), '"Referer":"' + baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap()["账号："] : '');
    if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('_ga=') && !String(Account).length > 0) {
        java.webView('', Get('url') + '/user/login', '');
    }
    if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('user') && String(Account).length > 0) {
        eval(String(source.loginUrl));
        Login();
    }
    let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
    let na = ck.includes('user') ? 'Y' : 'N';
    let top = cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'top_banner_counter_1500') > 0 ? parseInt(cookie.getKey(baseUrl, 'top_banner_counter_1500')) : 0;
    top += 1;
    cookie.setCookie(baseUrl, `${ck};_va=13;__na=${na};top_banner_counter_1500=${top}`);
    var list = java.getElements('.fed-col-xs6.fed-padding a.fed-btns-info');
    var date = String(java.getElements('.fed-col-md6.2').text()).replace(/更新/, '');
    for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        title = list[i].text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ');
        data.push({
            'title': i ==0 ? (title + '〔' + date + '〕') : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].attr('href') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);

    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {

}(key));
